title: Bib
description: circular neckpiece of scrolled pounded indigo applique with hot pink outline stitch; two brass beads with frog loops; bottom square has fauna and scroll indigo appliques and side loops; center 2-1/2\" square has tiny appliques of circles and diamonds in red, teal and black on white; bordered in black with single row running stitch
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
